Detailed Description

ManageableInputManager class definition to centralise all manageable inputs and launch the general update.

Member Function Documentation

void ManageableInputManager::input_update_general (  )  [inline, static]

call the update for all the manageable inputs primary vector first, then secondary vector (some of the primary may be used by some in secondary)
